column2: Unknown unmarked ship, who are you? What do you want?
A weird blue sphere. It's glowing, too. It's set up shop on my ship, and I have no idea what to do with it. Do you know what it is?
Aurora 2, homeport Earth. We're looking for your main mothership.
You must have some weird method of finding it… It's the biggest ship. Over and out.
Yeah, that was stupid of me. Over and out.
*The Rogue frowns.* I know what it is… Has it latched onto some kind of equipment?
That's right. What can you say?
I had a case like that… It chose my navigation computer. I threw it into outer space.
If there is, you'll have to look for it. I couldn't find one.
Okay. Thank you for the advice. Over and out.
